column1: Kudos to the Nigerian Government with their top notch “negotiation” skills. They were able to reach agreements with the corona virus on what times it could be seen in public places hence the curfew.

Coronavirus puts roughly 10% of those that get into into intensive care. The UK has maximum 4k intensive care beds (if you kicked off everybody currently using them).

Given nobody has immunity to this thing, 60% of people could get infected. If they all get infected at once 1/2
